title: Bug 2940: Export Zip - Updating of checkboxes should use busy cursor (1GKWVMA)
description: Bug 2940: Export Zip - Updating of checkboxes should use busy cursor (1GKWVMA) MA (01.10.2001 11:38:21) Description: It takes a long time (30 seconds in my case) to update the checked state of the table. The busy cursor should be shown. Steps to Reproduce: 1. In a workspace with many projects, select 'Export Zip'. 2. Select all projects. 3. Select file types and choose some. 4. Press 'OK'. Observed Behavior: - It takes a long time (30 seconds in my case) to update the checked state of the table. Expected Behavior: - The busy cursor should be shown during the update process. Notes: - Please note the significant delay in updating the checkbox states. - This issue occurs when exporting a large number of projects to a zip file.
